full_summary:
# [Government Tender Announcement](#government-tender-announcement)

## Solicitation for Tender: Contract for Building and Facility Maintenance and Repair Services

**Contract Information**

* Title: Replacement of Skylights at the Qimugjuk Building, Iqaluit, Nunavut
* Solicitation Number: WS3912441146
* Publication Date: August 10, 2023
* Closing Date: September 12, 2023 (2:00 pm EDT)
* Expected Contract Start Date: May 1, 2023
* Expected Contract End Date: September 30, 2023

## Contract Description

This tender solicitation cancels and supersedes previous bid solicitation number WS3912441146 (Doc4041004722) dated June 5, 2023, with a closing of July 18, 2023. The work under the contract involves repair of existing skylights, roofing, and cladding of the Iqaluit Government of Canada Building located in Iqaluit, Nunavut.

## Tender Details

* **UNSPSC Code:** 72100000 (Building and facility maintenance and repair services)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Delivery:** Iqaluit, Nunavut

## Evaluation Criteria

The tender will be evaluated based on the combined rating of technical merit and price.

## Contact Information

For further information, please contact:

* Alex Tikhonovitch, Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Email: [alex.tikhonovitch@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:alex.tikhonovitch@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Notice URL: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17122122?extsite=MTcxMjIxMjJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

## Note

This tender solicitation is subject to the terms and conditions of the Government of Canada's [Merx Portal](https://merx.com). It is the bidder's responsibility to review and understand the requirements and evaluation criteria before submitting a bid.
